thread.title: Are You Ready for an Amazon-Branded Checking Account? - WSJ

author: Emily Glazer
title: Are You Ready for an Amazon-Branded Checking Account? - WSJ
text:
Amazon.com Inc. is in talks with big banks including JPMorgan Chase & Co. about building a checking-account-like product the online retailer could offer its customers, according to people familiar with the matter.

The effort is still in its early stages and may not come to fruition, the people said. The talks with financial firms are focused on creating a product that would appeal to younger customers and those without bank accounts. Whatever its final form, the initiative wouldnâ€™t involve Amazon becoming a bank, the... RELATED VIDEO Is Amazon Going to Rule the World? Amazon wants to deliver everything you want to your doorstep, anywhere in the world. But the e-commerce giant faces several challenges in its pursuit of a global empire. WSJ's Karan Deep Singh breaks down the basics with the help of an Amazon delivery box.
